articles.title: Woman sues McDonald's after complaining burger ad was so irresistible it made her break fast during Lent - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Ksenia Ovchinnikova said she was trying to abstain from eating meat when she spotted a McDonald's burger ad, which made her give in to temptation.
articles.content:
A woman from Omsk, Russia, is reportedly suing McDonald's over an advert featuring cheeseburgers and chicken nuggets, which she said caused her to break her fast during Lent.

articles.author: Getrude Makhafola
articles.title: 'Let's refuse to co-govern with criminals', says Cele at North West cops' funeral - News24
articles.description: Criminals in South Africa believed they have a right to cause mayhem and co-run the country, Police Minister Bheki Cele has said.
articles.content:
• Criminals should not be allowed to "co-govern" the country, Police Minister Bheki Cele has said.
  • Cele was speaking at the funeral of two officers burnt to death in North West.
